metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14267 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
PDFResurrect 0.15 has a buffer overflow via a crafted PDF file because data associated with startxref and %%EOF is mishandled.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14267` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdfresurrect - 0.22-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdfresurrect package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.22-2').
